warlock.object.particle

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • warlock.object.particle.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Particle(Vector position, double angle, double speed, Color color, int size, double lifetime, double slowdown)
      Create a new individual single colored particle effect

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Particle

        public Particle(Vector position,
        double angle,
        double speed,
        Color color,
        int size,
        double lifetime,
        double slowdown)
        Create a new individual single colored particle effect
        Parameters:
        position - start position
        angle - angle it moves towards
        speed - speed of the particle
        color - color of the particle
        size - size of the particle
        lifetime - lifetime of the particle
        slowdown - how much the speed slowdown factor is per second (under 1 yields slow down, over yields speed up)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(double dt)
        Update the particle position, lifetime left and speed. Kill it if expired
        Parameters:
        dt -

      • render

        public void render(Graphic g)
        Render the particle
        Parameters:
        g -
